# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: where to get free bitcoin ?

Відповідь: There are several ways you can get free Bitcoin. The most common method is to use Bitcoin faucets, which are websites that give away small amounts of Bitcoin to visitors in exchange for completing a captcha or viewing some ads. Another option is to mine Bitcoin, which requires special hardware and software to do. Some companies also offer free Bitcoin rewards for playing games or viewing ads. There are even a few distributed computing projects for Bitcoin that offer rewards for performing computational tasks.
